trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the LDAP directory server should be in the same LAN as <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>. <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> does not cache the user's credential information locally and thus must connect to the directory server every time a user connects.

seg-source.mrk: For performance reasons, the LDAP directory server should be in the same LAN as <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> does not cache the user's credential information locally and thus must connect to the directory server every time a user connects.

target.mrk: For performance reasons, the LDAP directory server should be in the same LAN as <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> does not cache the user's credential information locally and thus must connect to the directory server every time a user connects.

trans-unit.source: Connection requests that provide the full DN are faster than those that must search for the full DN.

seg-source.mrk: Connection requests that provide the full DN are faster than those that must search for the full DN.

target.mrk: Connection requests that provide the full DN are faster than those that must search for the full DN.
